name: cache-stampede-load-test
description: K6 load tests for cache stampede prevention strategies

scripts.test:stampede:basic: yarn build && STRATEGY=basic k6 run dist/stampede-simulation.js
scripts.test:stampede:jitter: yarn build && STRATEGY=jitter k6 run dist/stampede-simulation.js
scripts.test:stampede:jitter-swr: yarn build && STRATEGY=jitter-swr k6 run dist/stampede-simulation.js
scripts.test:stampede:jitter-lock: yarn build && STRATEGY=jitter-lock k6 run dist/stampede-simulation.js
scripts.test:stampede:full: yarn build && STRATEGY=full k6 run dist/stampede-simulation.js
